n't be voting for him for president in the next election, she expects to be doing so someday. "I'll vote for him for president when he runs," Houston said. I'd really like to see him for president. I know he'll make a good governor. Pundits say you can't leave Congress and run for president. I'm not sure that's true. It's all where God wants you to serve. Houston said that because she knows Mike Pence is a godly man, she is sure he prayed and sought the leadership of the Lord in making his decision not to run for president in 2012.
